name: FUI Design Tool
description:
• 选择一个合适的布局，复制粘贴
  • 使用元素拼接出原始组件，复制组件并替换布局里的元素，使用水平翻转和垂直翻转调整组件方向
  • 修改原始组件，你可以实时看到布局中的变化


  • Choose a suitable layout, copy and paste
  • Use elements to splice out the original components, copy the components and replace the elements in the layout, use horizontal flip and vertical flip to adjust the component direction
  • Modify the original components, you can see the changes in the layout in real time
